trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The Tholl gourmand is licking his lips at some idle thought.
TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_TODO_00<tab>Search for the juvenile cliffmole.
TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_TODO_01<tab>Entice the juvenile cliffmole into the empty larder sack using a wriggling grub.
TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the full larder sack to the Tholl gourmand.

TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_GOURMET03547_000_000<tab>...Eh? What? Who? Oh! You're that <var 09 E948 ((traveler)) ((traveler)) ((foreign dwarf)) ((traveler)) ((traveler)) ((traveler)) ((traveler)) ((traveler)) /var> I keep hearing about!

TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_GOURMET03547_000_001<tab>...I mean, lali-ho! Almost forgot my manners there! Bad etiquette, that. Why don't I make up for it by cooking us a tasty steak <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((dinner)) ((breakfast)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((lunch)) ((dinner)) /var>)) /var>, eh? I'm thinking a nice cut of cliffmole...

TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_GOURMET03547_000_002<tab>Aye, well, I suppose that sounds none too appetizing. And the meat of an adult cliffmole <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> about as pleasant as chewing on your grandma's second-favorite pair of boots.
TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_GOURMET03547_000_003<tab>A friend of mine, though, he reckons the younger moles are tender and juicy as they come! What say you? Shall we put that claim to the test?

TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_GOURMET03547_000_004<tab>Then we'll need to catch one first. The juveniles are said to stay near humid areas, like caves and streams. I'm more of a “cave” kind of dwarf, so you can search the waterways.
TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_GOURMET03547_000_005<tab>Oh, and they're apparently a skittish lot─you'll need a plump grub to lure one in before you can stuff it in a sack!
TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_GOURMET03547_000_006<tab>Right. There's your grub, and there's your sack. Meet me back here and we'll set the pan to sizzling!
TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>The juvenile cliffmole eyes you warily. Time to show it the wriggling grub, then lure it into the sack...
TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_MOLE03547_100_012<tab><sniff> <sniff>
TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>The cliffmole trundles happily into the sack and begins feasting on the grub...
TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_GOURMET03547_000_020<tab>Couldn't find me any of the small ones. What about you?
TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_GOURMET03547_000_021<tab>Would you look at that! And on your first try, too! I'll just get a fire going and─
TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_GOURMET03547_000_022<tab>Wait! Wait, wait, wait...
TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_GOURMET03547_000_023<tab>Th-Those big, round eyes... That lovable face! How could anyone eat such a precious dumpling!

TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_GOURMET03547_000_024<tab>...I can't do it! Not even for the best steak in the world! Have this coin for your trouble, but <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((dinner)) ((breakfast)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((lunch)) ((dinner)) /var>)) /var>'s canceled!
TEXT_LUCKZI011_03547_GOURMET03547_000_025<tab>From this day forward, I'll raise you as my own! I'll feed you, and pet you, and call you “Cliffy”!
